skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I create responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in React.js  and versatile with various web frameworks, I adapt to project specifications, learning what's needed to deliver user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I craft secure and innovative backend solutions using Node.js and Python. My expertise ensures smooth and robust functionality, empowering your applications to operate seamlessly.

skills.title: Databases
skills.description: Proficient in various databases, I favor MongoDB for its flexibility. I adeptly tailor data solutions to project specifications ,optimizing data storage and retrieval efficiently.

skills.title: Code Instructor
skills.description: I train developers to code, emphasizing best practices and job readiness. My goal is to nurture skilled professionals ready to contribute effectively in the industry.

portfolio.title: Sushiman
portfolio.description: A dynamic Sushi ordering landing page crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This feature-rich web application offers innovative solutions to common ordering and menu browsing challenges.

portfolio.title: Buymerica
portfolio.description: It's an e-commerce web application created with React.js. It offers powerful features like search and filter, add to cart, account management, and a flexible light/dark mode. Start your online shopping journey with Buymerica today!

portfolio.title: Note-taker
portfolio.description: It's a Note Taker web application built with Flask, featuring secure user login, the capability to create, save, and delete notes. Our priority is ensuring your data remains super safe and secure.
